# init(dataType:shape:stride:)

**Initializer**

Creates an unallocated `BNNSTensor`

## Declaration

```swift
init(dataType: BNNSDataType, shape: [Int], stride: [Int])
```

## Parameters

- **shape**: The shape of the tensor.
- **stride**: The stride of the tensor.
title: init(dataType:shape:stride:)
